org.sakaiproject.util

Interface DbSingleStorage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

        Parameters:
        user - The Edit to remove.

      • getAllResourcesWhere

        List getAllResourcesWhere(String selectBy,
                        String selectByValue,
                        String orderBy,
                        int first,
                        int maxCount)
        Get a limited number of Resources a given field matches a given value, returned in ascending order by another field. The limit on the number of rows is specified by values for the first item to be retrieved (indexed from 0) and the maxCount.
        Parameters:
        selectBy - The name of a field to be used in selecting resources.
        selectByValue - The value to select.
        orderBy - The name of a field to be used in ordering the resources.
        tableName - The table on which the query is to operate
        first - A non-negative integer indicating the first record to return
        maxCount - A positive integer indicating the maximum number of rows to return
        Returns:
        The list of all Resources that meet the criteria.
